A '''potato eye''' is an item used to locate [[colosseum]]s and [[ruined portatol]]s (if used in the [[Overworld]]) in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|Poisonous Potato
|Output = Potato Eye, 2
|ignoreusage=1
}}

== Usage ==
Similar to how [[eyes of ender]] locate [[stronghold]]s, potato eyes locate [[colosseum]]s and [[ruined portatol]]s (if used in the [[overworld]]) by flying in the direction toward the structure upon {{control|using}}. In the [[Overworld]], potato eyes fly toward [[ruined portatol]]s, while in the [[Potato dimension]], they fly toward colosseums. In the [[Nether]] and [[End]] dimensions, or in a world that doesn't have structures enabled, potato eyes drop on the ground when used.
